title: No rain forecast as crews battle Flin Flon wildfire
headline: No rain forecast as crews battle Flin Flon wildfire
summary: Thousands have evacuated the northwestern Manitoba city, including municipal government officials and healthcare professionals. So far, the wildfires have displaced over 17,000.

title: Canada’s summer forecast 2025: Hot and dry conditions a concern for wildfires
headline: Canada’s summer forecast 2025: Hot and dry conditions a concern for wildfires
summary: This summer especially, many of us will be exploring our own country like never before and the weather will play an important role in where we visit and when.

title: Farmers snubbed on rising grocery prices, say advocates
headline: Farmers snubbed on rising grocery prices, say advocates
summary:
Grocery prices have been rising in Canada, but the money farmers are making hasn’t followed suit, National Farmers Union says. 
The post Farmers snubbed on rising grocery prices, say advocates appeared first on Manitoba Co-operator.

title: Spread of pea leaf weevil prompts wider watch in Manitoba
headline: Spread of pea leaf weevil prompts wider watch in Manitoba
summary:
Manitoba Agriculture to expand pea leaf weevil survey as the crop-damaging pest spreads to pulse crops farther east. 
The post Spread of pea leaf weevil prompts wider watch in Manitoba appeared first on Manitoba Co-operator.

title: Free spuds recognize international potato day
headline: Free spuds recognize international potato day
summary: The lower-cost potato vegetable compared to other produce items is a key to global food security and overall nutrition

title: Chickpea supplies tight despite large Australian forecast
headline: Chickpea supplies tight despite large Australian forecast
summary: All eyes in the desi chickpea market are on Australia, but an analyst warns you shouldn’t trust what you see.
